Race.SpecificTitle: Constable -- Justice of the Peace Ward 5, 2nd Just. Court
Fire Protection District Number 9 -- 24.02 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District Number 9 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District Number 9 of the Parish of Rapides, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a tax of 24.02 mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $153,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of 10 years, beginning with the year 2026 and ending with the year 2035, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection and emergency medical service facilities, vehicles and equipment, including both movable and immovable property, that are to be used to provide fire protection and medical services in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Service Area No. 1 of Fire Protection Dist. No. 11 -- 53.72 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Service Area No. 1 of Fire Protection District No. 11 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Service Area No. 1 of Fire Protection District No. 11 of the Parish of Rapides, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of 53.72 mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $181,800 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of 10 years, beginning with the year 2025 and ending with the year 2034, for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining fire protection facilities and paying the costs of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 10A -- 10.04 Mills Ext. & Reded. - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 10A Proposition
(Millage Extension & Rededication)
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 10A of the Parish of Rapides, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of 10.04 mills (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $1,496,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for an additional 10 years through the year 2035, and shall the proceeds of the Tax heretofore and hereafter collected be rededicated for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and keeping in repair the public roads, highways, bridges and related drainage facilities within the District, including related ditching and drainage and equipment?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District Number 36 -- 10.77 Mills Ext. & Reded. - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District Number 36 Proposition
(Millage Extension & Rededication)
Race.FullText: Shall Road District Number 36 of Rapides Parish, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of 10.77 mills (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $1,183,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for an additional 10 years through the year 2035, and shall the proceeds of the Tax heretofore and hereafter collected be rededicated for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and keeping in repair the public roads, highways, bridges and related drainage facilities within the District, including related illumination, ditching and drainage, and equipment?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District Number 7A -- 5.56 Mills Ext. & Reded. - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District Number 7A Proposition
(Millage Extension & Rededication)
Race.FullText: Shall Road District Number 7A of Rapides Parish, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of 5.56 mills (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $849,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for an additional 10 years through the year 2035, and shall the proceeds of the Tax heretofore and hereafter collected be rededicated for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and keeping in repair the public roads, highways, bridges and related drainage facilities within the District, including related ditching and drainage and equipment?
